description: Armed Violence, Small Arms Reduction and Human Security

subproject.description: capacity of the National Commission on smalls and security operatives strengthened to control the proliferation of illicit  small arms and light weapons in the country. Public sensitized on the dangers of small arms and light weapons in the country. Regional networks and collaborations strengthened for an integrated regional collaboration for the control of small arms and light weapons. Alternative livelihoods provided to local blacksmiths
subproject.title: Armed Violence, Small Arms Red

title: Armed Violence, Small Arms Reduction and Human Security
